page.title: 10TREORCHY MARKET
page.content: TREORCHY MARKET IS A SMALL VILLAGE MARKET OPERATING ON A SHELTERED SITE BEHIND THE CAE-MAWR FOOTBALL FIELD,ADJACENT TO THE LOCAL BOYS CLUB. IT IS OPPOSITE THE PARC AND DARE HALL CLOSE TO THE CENTRAL TREORCHY SQUARE AND WITHIN A HUNDRED YARDS OF THE RAILWAY STATION. IT OPERATES TWO DAYS A WEEK,THURSDAYS AND SATURDAYS.IT SELLS LEATHER GOODS, BOOKS AND TOYS,CHILDREN'S CLOTHES, JEWELLERY,COSMETICS,FRUIT AND VEGETABLES,CARDS,FOOTWEAR,MEAT AND SWEETS. IN OUR SURVEY OF STALL HOLDERS,MOST STATED THAT THEY HAD REGULAR WEEKLY CUSTOMERS AND WERE SATISFIED WITH THE ATTENDANCE EXCEPT SATURDAY AFTERNOONS WHEN IT WAS GENERALLY LOW.
